text: Třebešice Castle Třebešice Castle is located in Třebešice (Kutná Hora District), Central Bohemia. The structure itself dates back to the Renaissance times, with further changes done in the Baroque era. It fell into ruins after World War II. It was restored by the Italians Eugenio Percossi and Alberto di Stefano in 2015 and can be rented for events and films as well bed and breakfast.http://www.cestyapamatky.cz/toulava-kamera/73-zamek- trebesicehttps://georgeclooneyslepthere.com/o-brother-where-art-thou/extreme- castle-makeover-chateau-trebesice/ The layout of the castle is horseshoe- shaped, surrounded by a water moat. == References == == External links == * Official homepage Category:Castles in the Czech Republic Category:Castles in the Central Bohemian Region
title: Třebešice Castle
